alarmitronbackend.UserAlarms.UserAlarms

  • Packages that use UserAlarms 
    Package Description
    alarmitronbackend.UserAlarms  
    alarmitronbackend.Users  

    • Uses of UserAlarms in alarmitronbackend.UserAlarms

      Methods in alarmitronbackend.UserAlarms that return types with arguments of type UserAlarms 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<UserAlarms> UserAlarmsController.getAllUserAlarms()
      method that acts as a http get request that returns a list of all the alarms in the database

    • Uses of UserAlarms in alarmitronbackend.Users

      Fields in alarmitronbackend.Users with type parameters of type UserAlarms 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<UserAlarms> Users.userAlarms
      One user can have multiple alarms so a oneToMany relationship mapping is necessary joinColumn annotation is used here to join list of alarms with the id of the user who created them.
      Methods in alarmitronbackend.Users that return types with arguments of type UserAlarms 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<UserAlarms> UserController.getAlarmsForaUser(int id)
      get the list of all alarms that are under a particular user this confirms the OneToMany relationship mapping
      java.util.List<UserAlarms> Users.getUserAlarms()
      getter method that returns full list of alarms associated with user
